author: ianna
body:
- Backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/14010:
- Tracker with +/- 5 and +/- 10 percent material

As requested by Federico Ferri in the context of systematic studies for the Higgs->gamma gamma analysis. The material variations produced by Giacomo Sguazzoni.

The DB payloads are marked with 71YV6 and will be included in Run 2 MC GT queues with labels.
title: 2015 Tracker Material Variations for 71x
